title: 282: CHATTY BROS: Chatting Life & Bachelor Takes
itunes:title: 282: CHATTY BROS: Chatting Life & Bachelor Takes
description:
Grayston and Evan are back and they chat about the current going on’s in their lives/relationships, get a surprise call from Bekah, answer questions from The Broads about the latest Bachelorette episodes that include the WOWO challenge, Hunter’s approach, new entry Blake, thoughts on Greg, Andrew’s departure, Mike’s cuddle date, who they think is the best fit for Katie, who they think is the worst fit for Katie, they place some daring bets, and a lot more!

 

FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS HERE: 

Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/

Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***ROTHY’S:Through August 1st, 2021, you can get $20 off your first purchase of $100 or more at ROTHYS.COM/CHATTY

***FLEX FIT: Go to FLEXFITS.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY for 20% off Flex Disc Starter Kits or 10% off your first Flex Cup PLUS free US shipping! 

***HALO COLLAR: Save 20% on your Halo Collar by going to SHOPHALOCOLLAR.COM/CHATTY

***SENNHEISER: First 100 listeners who to go SENNHEISER.COM/PODCAST and use promo code CHATTY will receive 15% off the Momentum True Wireless 2 earbuds or any of their amazing headphones!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
